name: Savior: Borderland Crisis
description:
:  Savior :  Borderland Crisis is a puzzle, adventure game with a Sci-fi narrative story.

Short Story  :  Savior is an organization founded by 8 Celestial beings. Savior aims to protect and rejuvenate all the planets currently at war with the void. They are always looking for a "Summoner" with a unique power to help all the planets in need and you might be the one that they are looking for.

Game 1 Objective  :  Finding a healing leaf to make a healing potion. - Using the right mouse click to collect healing leaf - Using space bar to enhance magical power.

Game 2 Objective  :  Fighting with void-kin to receive magical planet gemstone. - Use the right mouse click to win the battle.

Game 3 Objective  :  Fighting with void-boss to receive magical planet gemstone and banish all the void out of Borderland planet. - Using the right mouse click to match the tiles. - There are 3 different tiles, Heavy Attack, Light Attack, and Healing. - Try to balance your health and attack at the same time.
